dmca.title: Blogger DMCA Complaint- Warner Bros.
dmca.body:
January 31, 2007


Google Inc.

Attn: User Support, DMCA Complaints

1600 Amphitheatre Parkway

Mountain View, CA 94043

Fax: 650.618.2649


Re: Unauthorized Use of Warner Bros. Properties:
http://simplisticsmovielinks.blogspot.com/
<http://simplisticsmovielinks.blogspot.com/>


Dear Sir or Madam:


I, the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am the owner
or an agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain
intellectual property rights, said owner being named Warner Bros.
Entertainment Inc. ("Warner Bros.").


Warner Bros. is the owner of trademark, copyright and other intellectual
property rights in and to the motion pictures entitled Harry Potter and
the Goblet of Fire, The Matrix Revolutions, Million Dollar Baby, Harry
Potter and the Philosophers Stone, Ocean's Eleven, Superman Returns, The
Departed, A Cinderella Story, Happy Feet, The Matrix, and The Wicker
Man. Because of these rights, no one is authorized to manufacture,
distribute, copy, sell and/or offer for sale products utilizing the
Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire, The Matrix Revolutions, Million
Dollar Baby, Harry Potter and the Philosophers Stone, Ocean's Eleven,
Superman Returns, The Departed, A Cinderella Story, Happy Feet, The
Matrix, and The Wicker Man Properties without the express written
permission of Warner Bros.


It has recently come to our attention that the web site located at
http://simplisticsmovielinks.blogspot.com/
<http://simplisticsmovielinks.blogspot.com/>

is offering content from the Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire, The
Matrix Revolutions, Million Dollar Baby, Harry Potter and the
Philosophers Stone, Ocean's Eleven, Superman Returns, The Departed, A
Cinderella Story, Happy Feet, The Matrix, and The Wicker Man Properties.


I have a good faith belief that such content is not authorized by Warner
Bros., its agent, or the law and therefore infringe Warner Bros.'
rights. Therefore, please act expeditiously to remove or disable access
to the above-referenced web site.


Please confirm that you have taken the appropriate action at your
earliest convenience. Thank you for your prompt attention to this
matter and please advise should you have any questions or require any
additional information.


This letter is not a complete statement of Warner Bros.' rights in
connection with this matter, and nothing contained herein constitutes an
express or implied waiver of any rights, remedies, or defenses of Warner
Bros. in connection with this matter, all of which are expressly
reserved.


Sincerely,


/mb


Michael Bentkover

Internet Specialist, Anti-Piracy Internet Operations

Warner Bros. Entertainment Inc.

4000 Warner Boulevard

Bridge Building 156 South, #5109

Burbank, California 91522

Phone: (818) 954-3639

Fax: (818) 954-7898

michael.bentkover@warnerbros.com
<mailto:michael.bentkover@warnerbros.com>
